en.title: Kitten Preparation Checklist | A Complete Guide to Everything You Need
en.content:
Before bringing a kitten home, make sure you have everything ready. It is important to create an environment where the kitten can feel comfortable from day one.

Essential Items Checklist

☐ Cat food (the same kind the kitten has been eating)
☐ Food bowl and water dish
☐ Litter box
☐ Cat litter
☐ Carrier bag
☐ Scratching post
☐ Bed (cat bed or blanket)
☐ Toys (feather wand, etc.)

Nice to Have

☐ Cat tree
☐ Brush and comb
☐ Nail clippers
☐ Pet wet wipes
☐ Deodorizing spray
☐ Scale (kitchen scale)

Fuluck Cattery Support

At Fuluck Cattery, we provide detailed information about the type and amount of food and key care tips at the time of adoption. We also provide a starter kit (food and supply samples). If you have any questions about preparation, feel free to contact us via LINE.

zh.title: 小猫迎接准备清单 | 所需物品完全指南
zh.content:
迎接小猫之前，请提前准备好所需物品。从第一天起就为小猫营造一个安心的环境非常重要。

必备物品清单

☐ 猫粮（与小猫之前吃的相同）
☐ 食碗和水碗
☐ 猫厕所
☐ 猫砂
☐ 猫包/航空箱
☐ 猫抓板
☐ 睡窝（猫窝或毯子）
☐ 玩具（逗猫棒等）

建议准备的物品

☐ 猫爬架
☐ 梳子
☐ 指甲剪
☐ 宠物湿巾
☐ 除臭喷雾
☐ 体重秤（厨房秤）

福楽猫舍的支持

福楽猫舍在交接时会详细告知猫粮的种类、用量及护理要点。我们还会提供入门套装（猫粮及用品样品）。如果您在准备过程中有任何疑问，欢迎通过LINE随时咨询。
